title: Riot K9 Nasus from Self Mystery Gift
body: First time I ever did a Mystery Gift on myself (and to others)...got Rito K9 {{champion:75}} ...is this even wurf??

replies.body: I legit got infernal, get rekt.
I got infernal but Riot is good and a bit rare as well.

Considering you can't buy it, its pretty cool. I mean, its better than a lot of other crap you could have gotten

Be thankful you didn't get Commander Xin Zhao or Dryad Soraka like I did LOL

> Be thankful you didn't get Commander Xin Zhao or Dryad Soraka like I did LOL

Lol eww...but I don't even use Pimp Cane :\
